Address.value: 200 EAST RANDOLPH STREET,SUITE 3300, CHICAGO, Illinois, 60601, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Kemper family of companies is one of the nations leading specialized insurers. With approximately $15 billion in assets Kemper is improving the world of insurance by providing affordable and easy-to-use personalized solutions to individuals families and businesses through its Auto Personal Insurance Life and Health brands. Kemper serves over 6.4 million policies is represented by approximately 35500 agents and brokers and has approximately 10400 associates dedicated to meeting the ever-changing needs of its customers.
